629680.name: Please Knock on My Door - Soundtrack
629680.description:
Official soundtrack for Please Knock on My Door made by Ola Bäckström.

Since many tracks are closely tied to the game’s story, it is recommended that you play through Please Knock on My Door before listening to the soundtrack.

BONUS: The soundtrack comes with eight voice lines from the game’s narrator, voiced by Tim Earle, which can be used as phone notifications!

Tracklist
1 Please Knock on My Door Theme
2 Memories
3 Morning
4 Routine
5 Night Falls
6 Failure
7 Numb
8 Diary
9 Limbo
10 Anxiety
11 Choices
12 Go Home
13 Our High School Club
14 Open
15 Clear Skies
16 Echoes
17 Slow
18 Unending
19 Darkness
20 Rip
21 Tear
22 Crash
23 Finality
24 Courage
25 Shackled
26 Crumbling Walls
27 Hope
28 Goodbye, friend

BONUS: Voice Lines
1 VO - Monday, misery
2 VO - Friday, finally
3 VO - Oh, right! One more thing
4 VO - Knock knock
5 VO - What, you dont remember me
6 VO - Expecting directions, are we
7 VO - Oh, did you notice that
8 VO - Ha Ha

英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
